From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Gotron turned and threw the gun across the room. He then stood in the
corner. He didn't want to act like that, but the honor of his family was at
stake. He had to do what he had to do. Gotron did not respond to Lady Hawk,
he just wanted her to leave him alone. Gotron realized he was in the main
room, so he went to his quarters where he couldn't be bothered...

----- Original Message -----
From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
Subject: Re: Bad move Soulstice.


> Lady Hawk stood confused as the shot hit at her feat forcing her to jump

better

meet
